title: Deadline Nearing, White House Plans Wider Changes to Public Service Student Loan Relief
description: Loan servicers are overwhelmed with calls from applicants seeking to meet an Oct. 31 deadline for taking advantage of temporary changes to a long-troubled aid program.
dc:creator: Stacy Cowley
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden spoke about student loan forgiveness at Delaware State University, in Dover, Del., last week.
